      • onConnectionStateChanged

        void onConnectionStateChanged​(java.lang.String device,
                              int state)
        

        

        参数:
        

        device - The device which Connection state is changed.
        

        state - android.bluetooth.STATE_DISCONNECTED   (0)
               android.bluetooth.STATE_CONNECTING     (1)
               android.bluetooth.STATE_CONNECTED      (2)
               android.bluetooth.STATE_DISCONNECTING  (3)
